1.name: Lamp-Anann
1.desc: Hamp-echor 'baseball' 'triblend' hîl gwathel vaer o 'cotton', 'polyester', a 'rayon'.

2.name: Karab a Ylp
2.desc: Karab, Himp, Ylp, Tolo, Pysg, Magnet...

4.name: Hamp-Laug
4.desc: Laug a moe anim nern ring.

7.name: Hamp V-Aek
7.desc: Pi anírach i 'v-neck' garam i-hamp anim le!
